title: The Affair at the Victory Ball

quote_first: I left my door ajar and at
quote_last: I heard Harvey walking across the living-room. There was a gurgling as he took a swig from one of the bottles on the trolley. He let himself out of the front door as quietly as he could. I watched him from the window; he was alone.
title: Billion-Dollar Brain
author: Len Deighton
